mapper.select: select user_id as userId, user_pw as userPw, user_nick as userNick, user_tel as userTel, reg_date as regDate from users where user_id=#{userId}
select user_id as userId, user_pw as userPw, user_nick as userNick, user_tel as userTel, reg_date as regDate from users where user_id=#{userId} and user_pw=#{userPw}
